name: texteditor
description: - I wanted to create a text editor that I can download. - This help me advance my knowledge on REACT. - Learned to make different folder structures to the REACT concept.

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
